1370: Scoutekiin moved to Die Camp.C.0 after marriage.
Got married to Flore at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Flore, Ghisele, at age 19.
1371: Had a daughter with Flore, Jute, at age 20.
1375: Lost son Wauthem when Wauthem was 0 years old.
Flore gave birth to their stillborn son Wauthem in 1375.
1383: Had a son with Flore, Oliuerus, at age 32.
Lost son Ghisele when Ghisele was 14 years old.
1387: Had a son with Flore, Didewar, at age 36.
1389: Lost son Oliuerus when Oliuerus was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
